Our mission is to change the way we visit Glasgow. Our philosophy: Leave the city cleaner than when we arrived. We are a small group of volunteers who meet once a month to tidy up Glasgow's waterways, parks or any area which needs our help. It takes little effort and makes a huge difference. 
 
If you would like to join us sign up on this app or email us at: 
 
peoplemakeglasgowcleaner@gmail.com
